document.full_text: japan's government is considering compiling a second extra budget sized at less than 1 trillion yen ($12.4 billion) to secure funds for payouts to households hit by the devastating earthquake in march, the asahi newspaper said on tuesday.
document.title: japan considering small second extra budget: media
lines_and_colors: japan's government is considering compiling a second extra budget sized at less than 1 trillion yen ($12.4 billion) to secure funds for payouts to households hit by the devastating earthquake in march, the asahi newspaper said on tuesday.
